game.name: Princess of Worlds End
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 텍스트 크기 조절, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 게임 메뉴 음성 안내, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 스테레오 사운드, 자막 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A dark fantasy visual novel about a girl named Princess who, through a strange series of events, unlocks a new power that changes her life forever. Guide Princess to help her get her life together, manage her relationships, her addiction and, most importantly, prevent the end of the world!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A dark fantasy visual novel about a girl named Princess who, through a strange series of events, unlocks a new power that changes her life forever. Guide Princess to help her get her life together, manage her relationships, her addiction and, most importantly, prevent the end of the world!
